JanuaryPrizeDraw.intro: The Global Poker prize draw is back and we wanted to give our most valued players the chance to be part of the 1 of 10 lucky winners to get a gift voucher - valued at $1000 each!
JanuaryPrizeDraw.feedbackMessage: You have successfully opted in and automatically entered into the draw to win 1 of 10 gift vouchers - valued at $1000 each!
